SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface IApplicationManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationManager
public interface IApplicationManager
The IApplicationManager interface defines the contract for managing BTO applications.

This interface specifies the operations required for:

  • Creating and managing applications
  • Processing application withdrawals
  • Booking flats for successful applications
  • Generating application receipts
  • Persisting application data

  • Method Details

    • getApplicationsForProject

      List<BTOApplication> getApplicationsForProject(String projectName)
      Gets all applications for a specific BTO project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to get applications for
      Returns:
      A list of applications for the specified project

    • createApplication

      boolean createApplication(Applicant applicant, BTOProject project, FlatType flatType)
      Creates a new BTO application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant creating the application
      project - The BTO project being applied for
      flatType - The flat type being applied for
      Returns:
      true if the application was successfully created, false otherwise

    • updateApplicationStatus

      boolean updateApplicationStatus(BTOApplication application, ApplicationStatus newStatus)
      Updates the status of an application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to update
      newStatus - The new status for the application
      Returns:
      true if the status was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • requestWithdrawal

      boolean requestWithdrawal(BTOApplication application)
      Submits a withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to request withdrawal for
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal request was successfully submitted, false otherwise

    • approveWithdrawal

      boolean approveWithdrawal(BTOApplication application)
      Approves a withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to approve withdrawal for
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successfully approved, false otherwise

    • rejectWithdrawal

      boolean rejectWithdrawal(BTOApplication application)
      Rejects a withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to reject withdrawal for
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal request was successfully rejected, false otherwise

    • bookFlatWithType

      boolean bookFlatWithType(BTOApplication application, FlatType selectedFlatType)
      Books a flat for a successful application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to book a flat for
      selectedFlatType - The flat type to book
      Returns:
      true if the flat was successfully booked, false otherwise

    • generateReceipt

      String generateReceipt(BTOApplication application, HDBOfficer officer)
      Generates a receipt for a booked application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to generate a receipt for
      officer - The HDB Officer generating the receipt, or null if generated by the applicant
      Returns:
      The formatted receipt as a string, or an error message if the receipt cannot be generated

    • saveApplications

      void saveApplications()
      Saves all application data to persistent storage.
